topic.title: RE3 Modpack Torrents
topic.body:
I created two torrents for RE3. One DrSlumpX's jill chastity modpack and the other a previously shared modpack, but this time as a torrent instead of a mega link.
Jill: 
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:F0F72FD31607EF39A29F5BF62DB9314C39E8D5E1&tr=udp://tracker.internetwarriors.net:1337/announce 
RE3: 
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:E9F098B677812C7FF909F19CAC9F35D4F79AE9D8&tr=udp://tracker.internetwarriors.net:1337/announce

1595607752_191qyhaRxXEx1bdtG65iQvFddtXBj.body: I'm seeding the torrent posted earlier. I'd like to assemble a larger modpack though.

1616496752_19JJxi9xd8dduBLSFztiT8LDrFHFh.body:
> [bynck42](#comment_1_1Q8n42U2B6pYxYJWo3S2JrQcNB3mTWp6Ad): It seems the first pack only contains ".rar.part" files. Changing the extension to .rar and winrar says the file is corrupt.
Yeah I'm not sure what happened with that. Frankly I don't understand the recent obsession with multipart compressed torrents. 
I have 2 other modpacks though both appear to be mixed RE2/RE3
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:9FEA9B71B7419A114A180CE704B9F5819320E381
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:1B37DFCC474D695D5FD7CF510F8E1DB054104D83
